p: Synonyms are Leucas calostachys var. calostachys and Leucas calostachys var. fasciculata (Baker) Sebald. L. calostachys is an aromatic herb that occurs in some parts of Uganda, including the Greater Mpigi region [ 14]. However, there is limited literature on this species. The local name in Luganda language is as follows: kakuba musulo [ 14].
